channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: HelloSky takes a different approach to recruiting top tech candidates.

item.title: 3 Reasons Your Relationship Feels Unusually Heavy, By A Psychologist
item.description: When a relationship feels heavy for ‘no clear reason,’ there are usually multiple reasons behind it. They're just waiting to be understood.

item.title: Videos show man killed by immigration agents was only holding a phone before he was shot, contradicting administration statements

item.title: CDC Vaccine Advisory Panel Chair Questions Polio Recommendation. Here’s Why That Sets A Dangerous Precedent
item.description: A physician provides compelling reasons why dropping the recommendation to vaccinate against polio could endanger public health.

item.title: A Psychologist Shares An 8-Question Quiz That Reveals Your ‘Boundary-Setting’ Style
item.description: Your approach to boundaries may be helping—or quietly hurting—your relationships. This quiz helps you find out.

item.title: FDA upgrades cookie recall to highest danger level over undeclared peanuts
item.description: The FDA upgraded the Gregory's Foods cookie dough recall to its most serious risk category over the potential presence of undeclared peanuts.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
